title: Shreyas As JammSession's Treasurer
body:
I propose to vote Shreyas (Discord Shreyas Hariharan
#2656) to occupy the financial/treasury manager for JammSession. Here are tasks he will be in charge of:

-> propose and maintain the budget; make sure expenses don't exceed the budget
-> make sure transfers are executed
-> update the community on the treasury
-> explore diversification of assets in the treasury
-> explore different revenue streams

Compensation: 10k $JAMM/month

Note: this proposition can be amended through a community vote with equal or higher quorum.
author: 0xbe40DCADB6bF4De1c7810EcA3504E5f3BEA9cF35
